# Kasia Malec Photography

> Professional food photography studio based in Łódź, Poland. Specializing in culinary photography, food product photography, and visual content for restaurants, brands, and agencies. Serving clients across Poland with focus on Łódź and Warsaw.

Kasia Malec Photography (malecphoto.com) offers professional food and culinary photography services. The studio works with restaurants, cafés, food brands, advertising agencies, and catering companies. Services include food photography sessions, food product photography, food styling, recipe development with photography, and food photography workshops/training.

- Location: Łódź, Poland (also serving Warsaw and all of Poland)
- Contact: kasiamalecphoto@gmail.com | +48 609 228 085
- Languages: Polish (primary), English

## Services

- [Food Photography](https://www.malecphoto.com/uslugi/fotografia-kulinarna/): Core culinary photography service — menu shots, editorial food photos, cookbook photography
- [Food Photography Łódź](https://www.malecphoto.com/uslugi/fotografia-kulinarna-lodz/): Food photography sessions in Łódź and central Poland region
- [Food Photography Warsaw](https://www.malecphoto.com/uslugi/fotografia-kulinarna-warszawa/): Food photography sessions in Warsaw and Masovia region
- [Food Product Photography](https://www.malecphoto.com/uslugi/fotografia-produktowa-zywnosci/): Packshot and product photography for food brands, e-commerce, packaging
- [Restaurant & Café Photography](https://www.malecphoto.com/uslugi/dla-restauracji-i-kawiarni/): Menu photography, delivery app photos (Pyszne.pl, Wolt, Glovo, Uber Eats), social media content, interior shots
- [Brand & Agency Photography](https://www.malecphoto.com/uslugi/dla-marek-i-agencji/): Commercial food photography for advertising campaigns, brand content, social media
- [Food Photography Workshops](https://www.malecphoto.com/uslugi/szkolenia-fotografia-kulinarna/): Training and workshops on food photography and styling techniques
- [Recipe Development](https://www.malecphoto.com/uslugi/opracowanie-przepisow/): Recipe creation, testing, and photography for cookbooks, blogs, brands
- [Food Styling](https://www.malecphoto.com/uslugi/stylizacja-zywnosci/): Professional food styling for photo and video shoots

## Key Pages

- [Homepage](https://www.malecphoto.com/): Overview of services, portfolio highlights, client testimonials
- [Portfolio](https://www.malecphoto.com/portfolio/): Gallery of food photography work across categories
- [Pricing](https://www.malecphoto.com/cennik-fotografia-kulinarna/): Photography packages and pricing (Starter from 1500 PLN, Standard from 2500 PLN, Premium — custom quote)
- [About](https://www.malecphoto.com/o-mnie/): Background, philosophy, and approach to food photography
- [Contact](https://www.malecphoto.com/kontakt/): Contact form, email, phone, location details

- [All Services Overview](https://www.malecphoto.com/uslugi/): Hub page listing all available photography services
